Text:
Post your full DVDR torrents in the Movies DVDR category.
They do not belong in the Movies category.
sorry, wasn't sure what DVDR meant. So only avi and the like can go in the Movies catagory? And full dvd's go in the DVDR catagory? Thanks for letting me know.
That's right. Full DVD images goes to DVDR category and avi, xvid etc goes to movies category. Thanks for upload, keep up the good work. I will seed as long as I can.
